title: Hardhat won't initiate create project sequence

labels.name: status:needs-more-info
labels.description: There's not enough information to start working on this issue

body:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/68036433/hardhat-wont-initiate-create-project-sequence

following the docs https://hardhat.org/getting-started/#quick-start

```
npm init -y
npm install --save-dev hardhat
npx hardhat 
```
then i get the below response which just skips create project.

Why is hardhat cli skipping the start project sequence?

Was working before but just stopped working.

```

```

Hey, @alexrmacleod 

You do have a hardhat config file in `/Users/alex/hardhat.config.js`, so Hardhat is using it.

Delete it and try initializing the project again, and you'll see the project initialization options.

I'm closing this issue, but feel free to reopen it if the problem persists.
Thank you. Had the same problem. deleting hardhat.config.js from global user is the solution.
